[theemo](./theemo.md) &gt; [SyncConfig](./theemo.syncconfig.md)

## SyncConfig interface

The config used to configure the `theemo sync` command.

`sync` consists of three steps:

1. reading 2. lexing 3. writing

See the config for each respective step. Reading and writing is expressed through the supported tools.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default interface SyncConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [lexer](./theemo.syncconfig.lexer.md) | LexerConfig | Config to \_make sense\_ of your tokens, as you need them in your domain |
|  [reader](./theemo.syncconfig.reader.md) | ReaderConfig | Config for reading tokens from external source |
|  [writer](./theemo.syncconfig.writer.md) | WriterConfig | Config to write them onto the disk for your used token manager tool |
